value.title: Annotell raises $24M to develop data labeling tools for autonomous driving systems
value.excerpt: Annotell, a company developing data labeling tools for autonomous vehicle systems, has raised $24 million in venture capital.

value.title: GM’s Cruise brings self-driving car rides to the public in San Francisco

value.title: Hilariously Poor Tesla Full Self Driving Performance In Boston Highlights Its Weaknesses
value.excerpt: Tesla seems to be in the news every single week for one reason or another. Sometimes it’s because they build products that are shockingly fast and other times it’s because they build products that are missing brake pads.

value.title: Emergence of Self-Driving Cars Drives the Growth in Machine Learning Market
value.excerpt: An essential component of centralized electronic control unit or ECU of a driverless car, machine learning technological solutions are expected to witness substantial demand in coming years. The solutions in the global machine learning market are anticipated to experience heightened demand owing to their application in self-driving cars.

value.title: Tesla to recall nearly 54K cars which could threaten future of Full Self Driving feature
value.excerpt: Tesla will have to recall close to 54,000 of its electric vehicles due to a feature called Rolling Stop which comes with the Full Self Driving premium package. The FSD is still in the Beta version.

value.title: Waymo Sues California DMV Over Robotaxi Safety Data
value.excerpt: The driverless car company — which is owned by Google parent Alphabet Inc. — operates an autonomous taxi fleet in San Francisco, and the question in the suit is whether public safety-related data can be a trade secret.

value.title: Humanoid robot is Tesla's 'most important product' this year, Musk says

value.title: Self-driving Teslas will cause 'insane' traffic, Elon Musk says
value.excerpt: Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the autonomous ride hailing service he envisions customers will put their autonomous Teslas to work in will cause "insane" traffic.

value.title: Tesla News: Automaker Prioritizes New Humanoid Robot Over Vehicle Models In 2022
value.excerpt: Tesla is prioritizing the development of a humanoid robot over its vehicles in 2022 and it will be designed to perform dangerous, repetitive, or physical tasks only humans can complete.

value.title: Elon Musk: Tesla is prioritizing product development of Optimus humanoid robot in 2022
value.excerpt: Elon Musk announced that Tesla is going to be shifting its product development to make Tesla Bot, a humanoid robot also known as Optimus, a priority in 2022. This is quite a surprising change of strategy.

value.title: Baidu, Geely EV Venture Raises $400 Million of Fresh Funding
value.excerpt: Jidu Auto, a smart electric vehicle joint venture between Baidu and Geely, completed a $400 million funding round backed by the two shareholders, the company said Wednesday. The breakdown of the new investment was not disclosed.

value.title: Self-driving car users shouldn't be accountable for accidents, report suggests

value.title: Baidu’s EV project Jidu secures $400 million in Series A
value.excerpt: Baidu’s electric vehicle (EV) project Jidu Auto announced on Wednesday that it has raised nearly $400 million in Series A as the Chinese search engine giant accelerates the development of EVs with self-driving capabilities.

value.title: Volkswagen, Bosch team up on self-driving software to test Tesla
value.excerpt: The platform, announced by VW’s Cariad software unit and Bosch on Tuesday, will serve all Volkswagen Group passenger vehicles before being opened to the wider industry. As a first step, the partners plan to roll out technology from next year that will allow drivers to temporarily take their hands off the steering wheel via an over-the-air update.

value.title: Mercedes sees Luminar eyes in its self-driving cars

value.title: Machine Learning And Artificial Intelligence: Implementation In Practice
value.excerpt: When it comes to AI, more and more companies are facing a choice: whether to develop a project using a traditional approach (predefined rules) or with the implementation of ML (teaching machines to do something not by instruction or logic but by examples or some kind of feedback).

value.title: Robotics Startups Seek to Build a Better Self-Driving Lawn Mower
value.excerpt: Tiger Global led an investment in Electric Sheep Robotics, which makes a device for large-scale, autonomous commercial mowers.

value.title: Boeing to pour $450 million into program for self-driving air taxi
value.excerpt: Aviation company Boeing said Monday that it's investing almost a half-billion more dollars into its sky taxi startup Wisk Aero, in a bid to bring the first self-flying air taxi to the market before the decade is out.

value.title: LG to showcase self driving vehicle next month
